attributes.action: Create a Syrian  Family Scheme Visa  for people homeless due to the earthquake
attributes.additional_details: We are people who have permanent residence, and some of us have British citizenship.  We have fathers and mothers in Turkey who are currently homeless, with no breadwinner but us.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to help and support  Syrian people in Turkey, who are homeless and have family in the UK to come to the UK, like the Ukraine Family Scheme visa.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632816
